The Department of Recreation is responsible for providing a comprehensive public recreation program for the residents of Toms River Township. Under the direction and leadership of Mayor Daniel T. Rodrick and Members of Township Council, the department continues to offer affordable recreational opportunities for residents of all ages. The department is comprised of five separate divisions:

  • Bey Lea Golf Course Utility
Tennis Court & Pickleball Courts lights are set to turn off at 10:00pm with the exception of 6th Avenue courts in Ortley Beach which are set to turn off at 8:00pm. Online Registration via Community Pass Credit card purchases will incur a convenience fee from the credit card processor - this is not collected by the Township.
